00016 class QString;
00023 template<class function_type>
00024         class CustomFunctionBase {
00025     public:
00026         CustomFunctionBase(): handle (NULL) {}
00028         ~CustomFunctionBase() { if (handle) dlclose (handle); }
00029         QString symbolic ();
00030         bool isValid() const { return valid; }
00031 
00032     protected:
00033         bool loadFunction (const QString &, QString = "f");
00034         void setValid() { valid = true; }
00035         void setInvalid() { valid = false; }
00036 
00037         function_type *func;
00038 
00039     private:
00040         void *handle;
00041         bool valid;
00042 };

00112 template<class function_type>
00113         bool CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::loadFunction(const QString &libName, QString funcName) {
00114     const char *error;
00115 
00116     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00117     if (!handle) {
00118         std::cerr << "Error opening library: " << dlerror() << std::endl;
00119         return false;
00120     }
00121 
00122     func = (function_type *)dlsym(handle, funcName.toStdString().c_str());
00123     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00124         std::cerr << "Error finding function: " << error << std::endl;
00125         return false;
00126     }
00127 
00128     return true;
00129 }
00130 
00133 template<class function_type>
00134         QString CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::symbolic () {
00135     typedef char* STRING;
00136     STRING (*sym)();
00137     sym = (STRING (*)())dlsym(handle, "symbolic");
00138     const char *error;
00139     static char *ret;
00140 
00141     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00142         std::cerr << "Error finding symbolic description in " << error << std::endl;
00143         return QString ("something");
00144     }
00145     ret=(*sym)();
00146     return QString (ret);
00147 }
